name: Romancing Monarchy (itch)
description:
What if the Tower of Babel Never Fell?

A Midsummer Night's Dream Meets the Bible in this Old-School Fantasy JRPG!

--------------------------------------------------------------

King Reinhart: Caspian, as it is now your sixteenth birthday, it is time for you to prove your worth as the heir to Achaea's throne. You must first show your ties to the dragon, Fafnir, by awakening him from his slumber. Only then can you fly to the Tower of Babel. Once at the top of the tower, you will be able to receive the Mandate of Heaven. Don't fret, you don't need to do this alone; I have made arrangements with Ruth's Tavern in order for you to gain companions for your journey! In addition, here's 1000G in order to properly equip you and your companions and a world map so that you never get lost. Good luck on your quest! Godspeed! 

--------------------------------------------------------------

Romancing Monarchy is an old-school fantasy JRPG heavily inspired by classic 8-bit RPGs. As the Prince of Achaea, it is your duty to obtain the Mandate of Heaven to continue your family's rule over Achaea. After assembling a party of four at Ruth's Tavern, you set off to explore the world in search of the Mandate, while meeting new faces on the way. 

--------------------------------------------------------------

Features: 
- A Fast, Strategic, and Exploitable Battle System 
- 2 Endings 
- 10+ Hours of Gameplay 
- Many Sidequests 
- A Complex Class-Changing System with 15+ Classes 
- 7 Playable Characters 
- A Catchy 8-bit-esque Soundtrack 
- A Difficulty Slider 
- Non-Linear Game Design Similar to Classic 8-bit RPGs

--------------------------------------------------------------

Classes

Prince's Classes: 

Landsknecht -- Focuses on physical attacks, buffs, and debuffs.

Elemancer -- Focuses on magic attacks and bestowing elemental properties to physical attacks. 

Basic Classes:

 Warrior -- Focuses on high attack and defense. 
 Cleric -- Focuses on healing the party. 
Mage -- Focuses on magic attacks. 
 Fighter -- Focuses on high attack, agility, and critical hit-rate. 
 Thief -- Focuses on high agility and confusing enemies. 

Advanced Unisex Classes: 

Armamentalist -- Focuses on bestowing elemental properties to physical attacks. 
Ranger -- Focuses on bow attacks. 
Crusader -- Focuses on Holy, Dark, and Life magic. 
 Scholar -- Focuses on Alchemy. 

Advanced Male Classes: 

Paladin -- Focuses on defending and healing. 
Mariner -- Focuses on Water magic, Wind magic, and physical attacks. 

Advanced Female Classes: 

Gadabout -- Focuses on greatly confusing the enemy. 
Berserker -- Focuses on physical attacks. Note: Cannot be controlled. 

Character Exclusive Classes: 

Princess -- Mix between an Mariner, Ranger, and Crusader. 
Lord -- Mix between a Paladin and Armamentalist. 
Maid -- Mix between a Mage and Scholar. 

Secret Class: 

Mime -- Focuses on mimicking enemy attacks.
